message: I'm being fair here, Bob.  Take it or we both get nothing!
You were generous, but I think I can do better than that!
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but this is my final offer. Take it or we both lose out!
I think I'm getting closer to a fair split. Your turn again!
I'm going to offer you more this time, Bob, but this is my last chance. If you reject this, we both get nothing!
I'm starting to think we're getting a little desperate, Alice. But I'm still hopeful we can reach a deal!
